original_text: He must not enter a place where there is a dead body. He must not make himself unclean, even for his father or mother,
korean_text: 어떤 시체에든지 가까이 하지 말지니 그의 부모로 말미암아서도 더러워지게 하지 말며

sentences.original_text: a place where there is a dead body
He must not make himself unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신을 부정하게 만들어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: even for his father or mother
